EmailTemplate.subject: Spring IO Barcelona 2015 - 2 days full of Spring, Groovy, Grails and Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring I/O is back! After a break for a few years, this conference is returning to the circuit. Let's help them get started again, register now with code SPRING10 for a 10% discount on this incredibly affordably priced conference! Don't forget to visit the Pivotal booth for demos, interaction, and your chance to meet and learn from the experts and professionals who drive the innovation! - Wednesday, April 29th • 14:00 – 15:00 - Building Microservices with Spring Cloud and Netflix OSS
- Speaker: Dr. David Syer, Pivotal
Now that you have Cloud Foundry, what are you going to do with it? This presentation will show using Spring Cloud on Cloud Foundry to quickly leverage common microservice patterns, including distributed configuration management, service discovery, intelligent routing, load balancing, and fault tolerance. Using Spring Cloud on Cloud Foundry, developers can take advantage of the cloud native microservice architectures pioneered by those building the web at places like Twitter, LinkedIn, and Netflix. In many cases they can do so running the same code with Spring Cloud wrapping the same battle-tested open source components those companies are running in production.
This is just one of the many sessions and hands on workshops from Pivotal speakers that will address topics in Spring, Cloud Native Applications, Big Data, Groovy, and Grails. Check out the full agenda of 38 great speakers from Pivotal, Google, Vaadin, JetBrains, Neo Technology, MongoDB, Couchbase, ElasticSearch, ZeroTurnAround, AppDynamics, Magnolia and more.
